metadata.title: 1D Rectangle Array — Strided Trait Access
metadata.description: Sum fields from BenchmarkRect[480,000] (16 bytes per element). Rectangle implements two traits: ICoordinate (X,Y at offset 0) and ISize (Width,Height at offset 8). Trait spans must stride over 16-byte elements to access 8-byte trait views — the core strided access pattern.

comparisonGroups.name: Coordinate foreach — X + Y
comparisonGroups.description: Sum X + Y using foreach. Coordinate trait at offset 0. Native Span foreach returns ref BenchmarkRect; TraitSpan foreach uses pointer-increment cursor striding 16 bytes per step.

methods.name: NativeSpan_Foreach_CoordSum1D
methods.label: Span<BenchmarkRect> foreach (ref)
methods.codeSnippet:
foreach (ref var r in _array.AsSpan())
    sum += r.X + r.Y;

methods.name: TraitSpan_Foreach_CoordSum1D
methods.label: TraitSpan foreach (ref readonly)
methods.codeSnippet:
foreach (ref readonly var coord in _array.AsCoordinateSpan())
    sum += coord.X + coord.Y;

comparisonGroups.name: Size foreach — Width + Height
comparisonGroups.description: Sum Width + Height using foreach. Size trait at offset 8 (non-zero offset). Measures strided foreach with a non-zero trait offset.

methods.name: NativeSpan_Foreach_SizeSum1D
methods.label: Span<BenchmarkRect> foreach (ref)
methods.codeSnippet:
foreach (ref var r in _array.AsSpan())
    sum += r.Width + r.Height;

methods.name: TraitSpan_Foreach_SizeSum1D
methods.label: TraitSpan foreach (ref readonly)
methods.codeSnippet:
foreach (ref readonly var size in _array.AsSizeSpan())
    sum += size.Width + size.Height;

comparisonGroups.name: All Fields — X + Y + Width + Height
comparisonGroups.description: Sum all 4 fields requiring both traits. Compares native foreach (single pointer, full struct), fused Zip enumerator (two pointer-increment cursors in lockstep), and dual indexer.

methods.name: NativeSpan_Foreach_AllFieldsSum1D
methods.label: Span<BenchmarkRect> foreach — all fields
methods.codeSnippet:
foreach (ref var r in _array.AsSpan())
    sum += r.X + r.Y + r.Width + r.Height;

methods.name: TraitSpan_ZipForeach_AllFieldsSum1D
methods.label: Zip Enumerator (fused pointer walk)

methods.name: TraitSpan_DualIndexer_AllFieldsSum1D
methods.label: Two TraitSpan Indexers (reference)
